thread.section_title: DIGIPRINT SUPPLIES Beoordelingen | Beoordelingen van DIGIPRINT SUPPLIES | www.digiprint-supplies.com
thread.title: Antonio Zala
thread.title_full: DIGIPRINT SUPPLIES Beoordeeld door Antonio Zala

author: Antonio Zala
title: Antonio Zala
text:
I want to share my experience with Digiprint Supplies and what happened.
I bought multiple Xaar 128/40 Printheads through a Coupon that provided a certain discount. I followed on with the order and got 128/80 by accident. I placed a ticket, as told in the chat, and the Tech Team was kind to ship the products back and send me the good ones within two days, (with a nice amount of Reward Points for my next purchase).
Very happy with my purchase although having a first bad purchasing experience.
